name: Change Of Space
description:
You controll a slow spaceship which can teleport and shoot laser bullets.

To move, use the w,a,s and d keys, and to teleport, quickly press the a or d keys, depending which side you want to teleport to.

You can shoot your enemies with the left mouse button. Each 20 points you score you get one currency which you can use to buy upgrades in the shop.
